questions.question: Explain how smart contracts can improve the efficiency of supply chain processes.

answers.a: By reducing paperwork and manual documentation.
answers.b: By automatically executing and enforcing agreements.
answers.c: By providing real-time visibility into the supply chain.

explanations.a: Correct! Smart contracts reduce paperwork and manual processes, enhancing efficiency.
explanations.b: Correct! Smart contracts automatically execute and enforce agreements without the need for intermediaries.
explanations.c: Correct! Smart contracts provide real-time visibility, improving transparency in the supply chain.
explanations.d: Correct! All of the above statements are true regarding how smart contracts can improve supply chain efficiency.

questions.question: In what ways can smart contracts enhance transparency in supply chain management?

answers.a: By recording every transaction on an immutable blockchain.
answers.b: By allowing only authorized participants to access information.
answers.c: By encrypting all supply chain data.
answers.d: By automating all supply chain processes.

explanations.a: Correct! Smart contracts enhance transparency by recording transactions on an immutable blockchain.
explanations.b: Incorrect. Transparency is achieved by making information accessible to all authorized participants.
explanations.c: Incorrect. While encryption may secure data, it doesn't necessarily enhance transparency.
explanations.d: Incorrect. While smart contracts automate processes, transparency is about open access to information, not automation.

questions.question: What role do intermediaries play in a supply chain with smart contracts?

answers.a: Intermediaries become unnecessary as smart contracts automate processes.
answers.b: Intermediaries are still required to execute smart contracts.
answers.c: Smart contracts have no impact on the role of intermediaries.
answers.d: Intermediaries become more prominent in a blockchain-based supply chain.

explanations.a: Correct! Smart contracts aim to reduce the need for intermediaries by automating processes.
explanations.b: Incorrect. The goal of smart contracts is to eliminate the need for intermediaries.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Smart contracts do impact the role of intermediaries by automating and streamlining processes.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Smart contracts are designed to reduce the reliance on intermediaries in supply chain processes.
